name: Angolmois 99
overview: Angolmois 99 [Superlite 1500 Series] is a card battle game. The game plot is about that in the summer of 99 the great king of the terror came down from the sky and want to conquer Earth, so is up to the player to defeat several opponents in card battle games to finally defeat the king of terror and save Earth. The gameplay is similar to UNO, the player have to have as less cards as he can at the end of the game, meanwhile he has to put the same card colour that is on the center of the screen.
